content.detailedDescription: My father said he saw something and told us to come outside.  i witnessed a bright red round object in the sky at about 7:45pm eastern time. the object was moving pretty slowly - even stopping at times - and then faded away. there were no strobe lights that are normally associated with aircrafts. it looked like it was a planet or a star at first; i realized it wasn't when i saw it moving.  did anyone else see something similar?
content.summary: Star/planet-like object seen in the nigh sky.  the object was bright red and moved very slowly and eventually faded.

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i were at mcdonalds drive thru, i looked up, saw a plane with a trail coming from it and a few inches (because it was pretty far away from us in the sky) we saw a translucent orb ascending into the sky. after about one minute of viewing it disappeared. looked nothing like the plane close by. we were facing east, we saw the sphere in about an ese direction.
content.summary: Silverish white orb ascending near plane then disappeared within two minutes

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was driving and was at a red light i looked up and there was oragne lights behind a cloud

2. i saw orange clouds

3. i had no idea

4. 

5. i was like *** is that..???? (word removed) cms 12/24/11 19:30 cst flg

6. i looked at my mom and looked back ujp and it was gone
content.summary: Orange lights then it was gone

content.detailedDescription: You can see the street light , and ufo above was only a bright light that did not move while my husband and myself were walking in the park accross from our home. we came home and got our camera and went to photograph and this is what we had after downloading the pictures. i was using the night landscape mode on a hand held kodak camera.
content.summary: You can see the street light , and ufo above was only a bright light that did not move while my husband and myself were walking in the park accross from our home. we came home and got our camera and went to photograph and this is what we had after downloa

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 74 or 75 i was at an y.M.C.A. summer youth camp in the san bernadino mountains. one of the activities was a blindfolded nature hike up into the mountain to a high meadow. our sleeping bags had already been delivered to the spot  when we got there. the counselors chaperones and us kids( about age ten) maybe a hundred of us total were sleeping late into the night. i was awakened by the loud sound of wind in the trees a loud rushing sound. i managed to open my eyes and lift my head off my pillow to look around. i could see a brightly glowing object or light. something was giving off light but didnt light up the surrounding area it was a bright white/blue-flame blue-electric blue. and was flashing in an erratic strobe type flash. it seemed to be landing descending to the ground the last thing i remember is that it almost was on the ground. i was soo sleepy i felt drugged and was all i could do to keep my eyes open and head up for that long. i did not remember the incident until some time later when i was back home.
content.summary: In the middle of the night on a camping trip i was awakened by the sound of wind in the trees and saw a glowing blue light landing nearby

content.detailedDescription: Looking out third story apartment window and noticed strange light or orbes in the sky which disaapeared after 20min.
content.summary: 2 stars very bright like narrow diamonds and then a third one appeared miles away.

content.detailedDescription:
In the summer of 1990 it was a very warm nite at about midnite maybe a bit later maybe 1 am.I stepped out into the front yard for some fresh air. the house was on a small hill as i turned to go back up the walk to the house i noticed to my right an object which at first i thought was a meteor. as i watched it i realized it was too big and too slow to be a meteor. it was huge.A long thick flaming green tail. it was consistently the same shape, length and width and color. an even gold green glow with a bit of sparkle. mostly green though. i was amazed by what i was watching. it was a about the length of my index finger held up at arms length. it was moving west over the sears point area towards petaluma and the coast. for as long as i watched it it did not slow down speed up or lose or gain altitude or change shape or brightness except for the faint flickering of the flame like tail.
eventually after some minutes of watching i finished turning to go back into
the house
content.summary: In the distance i saw a very large flaming green/gold object with a huge tail traveling level to the horizon

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were saying goodbye to a friend of ours at the front of his house, they were talking about his birthday, i was staring in a north westerly direction at the bottom of the avenue at the sky just above the chimney of the house directly in front of me, i suddenly noticed the lights, whether they appeared from nowhere or came into my view from another part of the sky i couldn't tell. i pointed to the lights/object excitedly and yelled to the guys to get their attention on it, they took a few seconds to locate it in the sky at which point they expressed great surprise at it's appearance, at this point it started to "hover" to the left. we jumped back into the car quickly in an attempt to follow it and rounded the corner at the bottom of the street when the object dipped below the tree line; disappointed at losing sight of it, we continued to turn left and cross the train tracks, then driving into the streets behind the group of trees that the object had "hovered" below in a smooth motion and at quite a fast speed. our searching from the car uncovered nothing and we drove back to our friends place to drop him off, all still very excited by the event.
content.summary: Witnessed 4-5 lights in  a line formation hovering above a treeline then appear to descend into/behind them.

content.detailedDescription: The town of mayville is approximately 4 miles wsw (almost west) of my house as the crow flies. my driveway is .2 miles straight and the entrance faces mayville. at 18:45 i went to walk to the mail box. above the grain bin lights of mayville, i noticed a ball of white light with red, blue, and green intermittent lights which weren���t blinking, just appearing then disappearing in a seemingly random pattern. at first i thought it may have been a helicopter, no noise, it was just hovering. i then noticed 3 single engine prop planes (used extensively in the area for crop dusting). these 3 planes were coming from different directions. you could hear their engine noises. their flight pattern suggested there was a destination ��� one was heading north, one heading east, the other heading south. their moving lights and sound suggested they were close to mayville at the normal altitude positioned between me and the orb light. the orb light i saw was moving slowly toward the west and in comparison to the prop planes was extremely bright. after ruling out a helicopter, i thought it might have been a star. a star cannot move and the cloud cover was at first above the light then the light went into the cloud cover. you could see a ���glow��� from the clouds. this was ruled out when it disappeared into the low flying clouds. the feelings i experienced at first sighting was, 'why is there a light above the grain bins? this time of night?'. i walked a few more feet down the driveway and stopped. the light was still there. i thought it must be a helicopter. this was ruled out when i noticed it moving away slowly. my mind tried to rationalize it being a helicopter, but there wasn't any sound until the planes appeared. you could hear their buzzing plane noise then those sounds slowly disappeared leaving the orb light which was fading into a cloud. i then thought it may be a star, the orb light was clearly moving unlike the other stars. i was excited, went to get my fiance to view it, but when i came back, the whitish colored orb turned reddish in a cloud cover and the light dissipated and was gone. i was bummed because i wanted to share the event, but i didn't want to leave it because i didn't want to miss anything.
content.summary: White light orb with red, blue, green lights

content.detailedDescription: I live approximately 10 miles sw of fairbanks center city along the chenna river where it joins the tanana river.  i was up early this morning becuase i did not plug in my vehicle and it is 15 below at this time.  i went outside my cabin at 0200 hours to plug in my jeep.  it is a crystal clear night and i always take the time to observe the sky when it is clear.  as i was outside, i noticed something that i have not seen before.  it seemed to be a bright orb like object that was either flikering or pulsating blue and red lights.  it seemed like it was hovering over the tanana river.  it was kinda jerky in movement.  it would hover with that jerky like motion for a while, then would clearly move.  when i say clearly move, what i mean is that may cabin is surrounded by tall spruce trees, and as it would move i would have to relocate to see thru the trees.  it would move and then hover with that jerky like motion.  not a sound.  clearly pulsating blue and red lights.  initially it scared the crap out of me once i realized that i could not rationalize what i was looking at.  i went inside, locked my doors, and turned on my outside lights.  after about ten minutes, i went back outside and it was still in the same general area, doing the same thing i observed before.  as i write this, it is 0246 hrs and it is clearly still out there.  it seems to be over the river at a angle of about 20 degrees above the horizon.  i tried to call the state mufon rep that lives about fifty miles from here in nanana but did not have any luck.  i then called the assistant state rep and was able to leave a message as i was observing the object.  there was a second object noticed in a different location, but i focused on the one that i was able to clearly see.  the fairbanks international airport is a few miles accross the river and i observe aircraft on a regular basis and am familiar with there flight patterns and charactoristics.  this was no aircraft.  the last time i went outside to check, i did see a obvious aircraft flying at a higher altitude.  they are still there.
content.summary: Bright object pulsating blue and red lights, hovering, moving, hoveriong over tanana river fairbanks

content.detailedDescription: The date was 12/22/11 time was between 12:00-12:20am i was in the passenger seat and we were leaving elk grove we got on  i-5 north heading towards downtown sacramento. we were about four miles from where the freeway merged with 50/80 and it happened to be a clear night, i looked to my right and saw five red orbs in the sky. the orbs were not blinking at all just solid red glowing balls. i have been on this freeway thousands of times and never seen anything like it. i assumed it must have been a tower or something that i had just not seen before. the light also seemed to be moving but i could not be positive since i was in a vehicle at the time.  the lights were in a semi triangle/ cigar shape. i lost sight of the objects as we merged onto 50 and exited the freeway onto broadway. another thing that was weird about 5 min later when we got to my house my coworkers car died the randomly started up again about 10 min later. she took her car to the mechanic and he could not find anything wrong with her car. the next night when i left work around the same time which happened to be a clear night i looked to see if i could see the lights again and there was nothing there.
content.summary: 5 red orbs in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on braddock rd at almost midnight on 12/23/2011 when i noticed something irregular in the sky that caught my eye. because these lights in the sky were almost the same orange color as the street lamps, i checked to make sure if i wasn't mistaken. i pulled over into a residential neighborhood to get a better look and the lights were indeed in the sky. about five lights were in a circular formation while two others just seemed to trail behind. there was no blinking, and movement was very slow to the point of non-existent. after no more than three minutes, these lights just seemed to dim, get smaller, and fade into the sky. while the first seven lights were fading out, an additional light appear in the sky behind everything, only to also fade out. i'm still feeling quite disturbed.
content.summary: Formation of about 7 orange crescent-shaped lights in the sky. they moved very slowly then faded away.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home from work on 12/22/2011 traveling i-95 through howard county and baltimore county, md heading northbound. when out of no where a large beam of light appeared and from light came a object which appeared to be round and spinning rapidly with blinking bright 
white lights. i believe that there were just a few lights that were colored (red, blue, green) but mainly all white on the unidentified object. i watched it go past my car on the left side. i almost felt like it was just a few feet away. as it went by i looked in my rear view mirror to make sure that it was still there. i could see it heading south down i-95 toward the elkridge (howard county)area.
content.summary: Rotating circular object spinning and blinking lights hovers and takes a path down i-95

content.detailedDescription:
I walked out my front door this evening to go christmas shopping and when i walked out the front door, i saw a large glow eye level coming around from the south of my house moving to the northwest. it was moving parallel to the ground, elevation about 200ft. above ground for about a half mile then going much higher in the air,almost straight up. when i looked up into the sky in the direction it was going, i saw three lights evenly spaced in a triangle shape. the center light of the three was pointed to the north. at that point of time i opened the front door and shouted at my two boys and wife to come see this. by the time they got out side, their was between 8 to 10 more of these fire balls flying the same path. it was then i called (911) and spoke with the dispatcher explaining to him what we were seeing. at first when i was speaking to him, i told him i didn't know what they were, then i said they maybe flairs, but i believe i finally told him that they weren't, after seeing them all running parallel with the ground and taking the exact same path, at the triangle light much higher up. it was as if they were flying into it. the dispatcher asked me what direction they were from what intersection. i told him and he said he would have somebody check into it. i spoke with him at 6:17pm. haven't ever seen anything like this, and no more activity since this happened. by the time i had gotten off the phone they had all disappeared.

this was pretty exciting, and amazing!
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 8 to 10 ufo's flew past our house.

content.detailedDescription:
Took this picture during a lightening storm, early evening of 11 june 2009.
object stayed in one place and blinked out after about two minutes.
seemed to be a large orb about one mile up in the sky above some trees.
content.summary: Bright orb shaped, stationary, then went out after a couple minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I was stargazing around a campfire with my brother when we witnessed a large orange glowing object to the east.  it was a very clear night, the time was around midnight.  my mother, who was in a nearby cabin, had a pair of binoculars.  i watched the object through the binoculars for about 5 minutes.  it hovered at first then slowly descended down.  just before it fell beyond the horizon it changed from bright orange to bright blue.
content.summary: Witnessed bright orange light, slowly descended, changed color.

content.detailedDescription:
I was laying on the beach facing toward the town on a sand hill, talking on the phone when i'm looking at the sky and a, probably, uso, just came from the direction of the ocean and went on a straight trajectory east.  

it was silent, had 3 red glowing circles at the points of the triangle.  i was startled and told the person i was talking with what i was seeing instead of taking a picture.  

it silently continued on a straight path until it disappeared far above the horizon.  it was beast.
content.summary: Had to have been huge because how far up from the horizon it was when it dissapeared into the sight-line trajectory, no noise whatsoever tho

content.detailedDescription: I was driving up interstate 5 in southern california around the northridge area around 6:30am today december 23rd, 2011. i could see in the distance what at first i thought was a meteor almost directly in my sight path.  it reminded me of when someone locks up their brakes and leaves 2 distinct solid trail marks.  but these trail marks were an unsual glowing blue parrallel to each other.  both trails started to expand slowly and suddenly moved rapidly in a straight line.  both lines were a solid color that did not fade at either end.  then there was a quick blink/flash and instantly the solid lined blue trails instantly disappeared.  i have seen meteors before but this was nothing like it.  there is no way i'm the only one to see it because it was in the sight path of a lot of commuters.  the whole event lasted probably about 15 seconds.  my jaw just dropped and was dumbfounded about what had just happened for the next few hours.  this isn't the first time i've seen strange lights in this area.
content.summary: Long expanding blue colored trail that slowly then quickly expanded then disappeared after a quick flash.

content.detailedDescription:
At 12:30 am, i exited my house into the backyard to let my dogs out to go potty and out of corner of my eye i saw 5 lights in the sky.  i took my cell phone out to take a picture and ran back into house to notify my partner to come outside and witness this event.

then we went outside to the front of the house and they were still there hovering.  right after we got out there, more of them appeared... close to ten of them.   they were all hovering but some were stationary and others moved around slightly in relation to the others.  they formed shapes like a big dipper shape.  then they started disappearing.  when there were three left, the three formed a triangle shape.  an additional lone object approached the hovering ones.  the hovering ones disappeared, and the approaching one was nearer to us than the hovering ones had been.  

my partner had no coat on and was desperate to get warm and went in the house.  then the last object disappeared so i went back into the house.

i knew it was ufo objects because i saw two of these same objects just two months ago and we looked at some documentaries about ufo sightings to see what other people were seeing at night, and the bright star- like objects were exactly what we saw both today and two  months ago. 

in both cases, the objects approached within a few miles of our residence and flew over/ hovered until disappearing.  

first, i felt shock to see what i was seeing... like i couldn't believe it but it is was real.  i felt afraid and nervous that something bad may happen to my family.  i wondered what they were doing and why.  i did not like not knowing. it was confusing. 

i took a digital image of the objects when i first saw them in the back yard... then both my partner and i took numerous short videos of them in the front yard.  i can send these but it's late and i need to get some sleep... but would be glad to send them maybe later today or tomorrow.  they were made on cell phone, but may be useful.
content.summary: Five bright objects moving nw to se then hovered just sw of my home for appx ten minutes.  more appeared then disappeared one by one.

content.detailedDescription: On december 19, 2011, while in the car with my husband i witnessed something i've ne er seen before. as we were returning from shopping late on that evening, it had already gotten pitch dark. it was a little after 7pm. i was looking out the passenger window at the businesses as we passed by them, something caught my eye and i looked in the sky, above everything. i saw this thing that looked almost like a ball of light, it was shining a beam of light out of the top of it into the sky above it. the beam shown very high above it, probably 50-100ft above it. you could see it fade into nothingnes.   like when you shine the beam of a flash light on a itch black night, you can see where the beam ends. that's how this was. it was also about 25-50fy acro. a quick note i'm estimating here, i maybe way off not sure. i tried to get my husband to see it but he wasn't able to for fear of wrecking. we drove about a block or two with it still doing this and staying stationary. i turned my head for a moment i believe to tell my husband something and once i turned my attention back this craft had turned off the beam of light. now it  just looked like a ball of light just np where near as bright. i could now see one single red blinking light on it. i could sorta make out a shape even though it was dark. it was sorta ball/saucery like shaped. of course i'm sure the darkness didn't help me any in knowing the exact shape. during this whole time i was just kinda amazed and curious about it. the road made a turn and i lost sight if it, then found it again. only to lose it again and never find it again. which i find very strange that something like that could just completely disappear with out a trace with all the light it was amitting. the speed of the craft the whole time seemed very slow. so that's how i don't see it disappearing like that even i'd it dis speed away. at first it just hovered there while ir shunned the beam.  i've never sen anything like it. my first thought was it was a helicopter, but what doesn't make sense is the thing looking like a ball of light even after the beam of light. i mean i know helicopters can have search lights so you can't use that as a point to show it wasn't one. i suppose you can be the judge of what you think it was. to me i'm unsure but it sure seemed strange for a helicopter.
content.summary: Craft shining beam of light in night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I am normally a skeptic regarding ufo's and generally am the first to explain away some event. however i have spent the whole night looking for explanations and i can't seem to find anything or any additional reports.



i live in new york city in midtown manhattan. i was sitting on top of my rooftop just hanging out with my friend while she smoked a cigarette. all of a sudden we both saw these dullish lights start fading into view at about 65-75 degrees in the sky. we kind of blew it off due to the fact that there was some slight cloud cover.

it was whitish light in small blotches similar to the lights over phoenix sky several years ago that i saw on the news. suddenly a small orb seems to shoot out around the object and made a very quick and sudden movement then faded from view. this object looked like a star moving...Or some sort of small craft.

then about 15 minutes passed while we waited and tried to figure out a way to take some pictures or video. we have no way to take night photos or video because we both only had an iphone and blackberry. then a bright flash came down from the sky above the alliance building in nyc sort of like a meteor . it looked like it was falling into the city but may have fallen past the city line but it really was a bright bright white ball that didn't have a tail.

then about 5 minutes later the circular shaped dull lights started to fade into view directly above our heads high in the sky. they were fairly bright at this time, and extremely obvious. they stayed in place for about 15 minutes but would occasionally shine in and out, changing the overall shape. sometimes it would appear as a circle, sometimes it would appear as a circle with a small tail. it almost appeared as a set of constellations in the sky. it was actually incredibly beautiful, and we keep checking the news in hopes that other people were watching skyward.

we checked later to see if there was some event that took place in the city but there is nothing that can explain what we saw. we know there is the ursa minor meteor shower at peaks tonight, but that would only explain one part of the phenomenon we experienced.

to add, several planes were scrambled and passed over the general area in the sky. two non commercial jets and a high altitude plane that came out of nowhere.

however this is nyc and it can get really busy with planes during the holiday season. this still doesn't explain the lights. afterwards we just felt like we had experienced something really life changing and actually we both felt a bit scared. we are not really sure who else to bring this information to because this is our first time doing something like this, but we are sure of what we saw.

we have gone back outside to see if the lights have come back but its now raining and impossible to see anything. we will check again tomorrow night.
content.summary: Multiple lights in circular pattern shining above nyc followed by bright object falling

content.detailedDescription:
I was asleep and woke to a buzzing sound and snapping of static electricity in my room and around me. the buzzing sound seemed to be in the room with me. i looked at the clock and it as 5 am (12/22/2011) -- stafford, va. i went to the window and looked upward and saw a large dark traiangluar shaped craft slowly passing overhead in a south to northern direction. there was a bright white light on each corner and the craft traveled with one point forward. a red blinking light could be seen on the bottom of the craft. the craft seemed to be making no noise whatsoever but creating a hum in my bedroom and lots of static electricty (my hair stood on end). i woke my mom and she looked out the window to see it hovering over the trees about 270 feet away (about 10' over the trees). i figure the width of it as it passed overhead and over the trees was about twice the size of the back (widht of the homes behind my home) or about 120 ft.

i didn't get a photo though had my cell phone with me. i didn't have my video camera battery charged. but charging it now in case there is a repeat.

odd thing. my dog, boomer, a 125 lb yellow lab slept through this even though i was up and yelling at mom to take a look, etc. the dog never acts this way... very vigilant... but he kept quiet or stayed asleep.

i could do a sketch.  so could my mom.  i could map the path it took while in my view to a great degree of accuracy.
content.summary: Triangular shaped craft over stafford, va

content.detailedDescription: So i was doing exposure photos with my canon t3i of this really cool road, so i was trying different angles and captured some sort of yellow and greenish sonic booms i guess you can say. i mean that's the closest thing i can say to describe it. it was unable to be seen by the naked eye when this event was taking place. i noticed these booms when i was reviewing the photo in my car when i packed up... i didn't notice it till afterwards.
content.summary: Captured 2 sonic booms of ufos but there was no boom

content.detailedDescription: It was slightly below top dead center so i could see up one side a little and it was just a shiny round ball. the sun was bright, no clouds at all and it was reflecting the sun like a mirror. i cannot say how high it was or how large it was but it was unlike anything i've seen before. there is no doubt in my mind itwas extraterestrial.There's nothing made by man like it. my foreman was talking to me and the sun was slightly behind us.I saw the object come over the horizon from the north and it went straight to the south and disappeared over the horizonto the south. i said to my foreman, "what is that?" and before he could turn around it was gone. to this day i'm still kind of in shock
content.summary: With the afternoon sun  slightly behind me the object(orb) went from north to south and disappeared from view in about 5 seonds. there was no sound, or vapor trail. i said to my foreman, ''what is that ?''and before he could turn around it was gone

content.detailedDescription:
I'm in my living room, in a nine story building looking due east.  i reported this same thing two days ago.  i've been viewing it now for three days.  it's in orbit.  it's not a "v" shaped craft like you portrayed on the site.  it's still flashing all the colors i mentioned before that i can see with my naked eye.  my binoculars sharpen up the image a bit but it's still star sized.  i've never seen it before three days ago when i first reported it.  i don't know if it's one of ours or extraterrestrial.  the orbit hasn't changed.

i'd like to know what this is.  i've checked youtube for new video's but no luck.  everyone should be able to see this on a clear night.
content.summary: Starlike, flashing lights of red, blue, green, yellow, white in the middle.

content.detailedDescription: Driving north on scenic drive in trinidad 6:15 pm saw 3 bright lights in a straight line cruising along above the coast line. i noticed that there didnt seem to be any flashing lights on the objects, just pulsating yellow light. when we pulled over to continue watchin the light went into a diamond formation and stayed like that for another 45 seconds and then each one simply disappeared. wondering if anyone else saw this. it was pretty amazing.
content.summary: 3 glowing orbs in diamond formation over the ocean, disappeared after several different formations

content.detailedDescription: Driving north on scenic drive in trinidad 6:15 pm saw 3 bright lights in a straight line cruising along above the coast line. i noticed that there didnt seem to be any flashing lights on the objects, just pulsating yellow light. when we pulled over to continue watchin the light went into a diamond formation and stayed like that for another 45 seconds and then each one simply disappeared. wondering if anyone else saw this. it was pretty amazing.
content.summary: 3 glowing orbs in diamond formation over the ocean, disappeared after several different formations

content.detailedDescription: Red light in clouds saucer shaped. looked like a plane had gone etch a sketch and drawn a red saucer with smoke.  never seen red before.  always white smoke from planes
content.summary: Red light shaped like saucer up in clouds size of football half a football field

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home on a semi busy road here in the algarve portugal, which is surrounded by mountains. the mountains are not large like the ones in british columbia but large none the less. i saw a very bright light which the only other thing that high up could have been is the front end of an airplane with the front headlight pointed exactly towards where i was driving behind other cars heading home. there is an airport not to far away in the city of faro, which is where i was leaving. being here a while now i can generally tell the flight patterns and with this wide open sky i can differ from certain types of planes and helicopters.. anyway.. this particular light i saw was near dusk and lower than any normal star and brighter than normal. i was mentioning the mountains before because that is what i am using as a reference. the light was not much higher than the mountain and i kept my yes on the road but constantly looking at the light which i noticed it move a bit back and forth. it was basically almost straight ahead of me at this point about 5 miles ahead or so when suddenly it veered at a super speed and still lit about a mile south or so then instantly took off upwards and it was gone. the catch is that i've now seen it 3 night in a row. today i got off work at 3pm and did some errands reached home here about 6. i saw it again tonight and when i came inside to grab something the light which i've seen now for the last few night was basically in the same sort of area and when i came back outside it was gone. i know it was what i saw the last few nights because of the location. this week i am going to purchase a good night vision video camera because with this big open sky that i have above me i would like to get some get some great video of this. 
 if you have any questions please feel to call my cell phone or email me. with the phone numbers that i left you do not include area codes, just the straight numbers. thanks.
content.summary: Glowing very very brightly. very rapid movement abruptly south then an immediate take off upwards out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: On december 10, 2011 around 11:00 pm i was traveling south on route 113 just north of silverdale pennsylvania. it was a clear crisp night with a full moon and minimal cloud cover. i saw this bright light coming from the northwest out my passenger side car window. at first i thought it was a plane or helicopter, but the longer i watched the object the more it didn���t appear to be either. i decided i needed to pull over before i got into an accident, so i pulled into a restaurant parking lot. this object was a reddish orange sphere or ball of light traveling towards me at a medium pace. as i watched more of these spheres appeared until there was approximately 5 or 6 of these objects following each other evenly spaced apart. they moved following the same path making no noise, one at a time elevating into the sky, disappearing just south of me. i tried to get some other driver���s attention who were traveling down route 113 by jumping up and down pointing to the objects in the sky. this whole ordeal happened in about 1 minute or so, not a long time, so just a few cars passed. i am sure these people thought i was either a crazy man or drunk. not sure if i was successful in getting any of the other driver���s attention, but if anyone did see these objects, make a report and submit to mufon. being a scientist i tried to rationalize what i saw, but couldn���t come up with any reasonable explanation except that these reddish orange spheres were ufo���s. doing a little more online searching about ufo sightings, i came across a sighting on december 5, 2011 where several people reported seeing at least two ufos in allentown pennsylvania the direction where these spheres were traveling from. i never thought in my life i would ever see something like this, it is something that you see on tv or have heard, but it is an experience i will never forget.
content.summary: On december 10, 2011 at 11:00 pm in silverdale pennsylvania. i saw 6 reddish orange spheres following each other from the northwest making no noise.
